title: Horn of Boromir (3R42)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.
Lore:	“On a baldric he wore a great horn tipped with silver….”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL, MXL
